text: Antonia Irma Piñeyro Arias (born 26 September 1954) is a Mexican politician from the Revolutionary Institutional Party. She has served as Deputy of the LV, LVIII and LX Legislatures of the Mexican Congress representing Oaxaca. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tlaxiaco Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:New Alliance Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: Irma Piñeyro Arias
